message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. It's a fair offer considering the time pressure.
I think we can do better than your initial offer. Considering the inflation, I believe this is a fair split.
Bob, time is running out and the value is decreasing. I'll take a small hit with $55, leaving you with $45. Let's close this deal.
I see you're getting anxious about the inflation. I'm willing to make a deal, but I think I deserve a bigger share since the money is worth the same to me.
